name: We Are Lost
description:
On a day that started like any other, you were startled by Ashley and her story of a contest she won, granting you all a trip to an expensive resort. Ultimately deciding to leave, you start packing your things. But not all is as it seems.. As the corporation in charge of this contest has some deeper, more sinister plans for you. Choose your protagonist and unravel the story, discover the goals of this corporation and form unbreakable bonds with the people around you. Will you take advantage of the situation? Corrupting the others and bending them to your will? Or will you give love a chance? The choice is yours.



We Are Lost is a story based Visual Novel with a choice between two male protagonists. Depending on your choice the story in front of you will be entirely different! However, that is not the only choice this game will offer you. The way you choose to act with the characters around you will shape their own personalities. Will you try to corrupt them? Turn them into your own perverted playthings? Or will you support them in their journey alongside you, developing feelings in a more organic way? There is no wrong way to play this game. Whatever choice you make will be valid in some way.
